turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, from where?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, from Starbucks espresso beverages.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, a cup of coffee will be good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what kind of drink would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let me see.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You can add some honey and whipped cream to the coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what kind of coffee would you like, did you want a latte, americano, cappuccino or some other type of espresso beverage?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, cappuccino would be perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, would you like to add any milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I'm okay with the honey and the whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: cappuccino's are typically served very hot, do you still want whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i can add that, what size did you want to order that in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Come again.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size did you want your drink in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Come again with what you just said.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I want it a big size, a large size.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would that be a grande or a venti?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: a Grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering a grande cappuccino with honey and whipped cream, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: which location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I would prefer the Starbucks at 1500 Goodway here in New York.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, one moment while i send your order to that location.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have ordered you a grande cappuccino with honey and whipped cream to be picked up at the starbucks on broadway in new york. your drink will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright. Thank you very much. Yes, will you like to join me for the cup of coffee?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: unfortunately i am a home assistant and have to stay at home.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright. Alright, there is no problem. Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: have a nice day and enjoy your coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, have a nice day. You too.
